post.body: I will add it to my Netflix queue!
my lips are sealed.
never seen "Vicar of Dibley," but I love "French & Saunders."
I cannot tell a lie. It WAS delicious! :)
1/4 cup freshsqueezed orange juice, 1/4 chicken stock, tsp dijon mustard, pan drippings, flour, salt & pepper.
sure! all you have to do is come to Kansas.
would "Bubba Fatt" be better?
that is one of the nicest things anyone has said to me in a while! thank you!
I wish I were more like Sir Didymus!
do you need some of my Xanax?
http://twitpic.com/v0pa - It's just like Romeo & Juliet!
it looks kind of like Tumblr.
"Oh, my mistake. That's not a bullet hole." Ha!
when my daughter was in 3rd grade, she told her class she wanted to be a zooarcheologist when she grew up.
Got Julie the complete AbFab on DVD. Now we're gonna watch some.
Solstice dinner was a success! http://www.flickr.com/photos/librarygoblin/3125965977/
Finally saw Kung Fu Panda. Absolutely brilliant! Loved it mightily.
Chicken is now in the over, along with potatoes. Much later, I'll make some carrots & peas, & we'll have a tasty Solstice dinner.
Stuffing oranges & rosemary up a chicken's bum.
I now have every season of Babylon 5 & Justice League! I'm so happy!
